description: A tour of the park looking at the recent improvements on site and the benefits to the local community, including the new playground, football pitches and changing room, outdoor gym and planting.

events.name: Bartett Park Tour
events.notes: Visitors can arrive at any time during the opening hours.There may be queues at busy times.

factsheet.heading: history
paragraphs: Bartlett Park is a public open space in Poplar in the London Borough of Tower Hamlets in London on Upper North Street. It is located to the south of the Limehouse Cut waterway and the Lansbury Estate to the south and east of the park. The whole landscape is 4.95 hectares (12.2 acres).

location.meeting_point: BY the Bartlett Park Playground entrance, Opposite Poplar Union

name: Bartlett Park
